title: "10 Winter Chests & Keys + 1 Bonus Set!" doesn't actually give that.
body:
I bought this and I got 11 winter chests, I thought it would be 10 winter chests + one of the poro king chests.
Even the image clearly shows a winter chest + a poro king chest.

What's the deal?

replies.body: I went to the store to check it out, and everything looks okay to me.  The icon that shows with the set is a Snowdown Bells icon and not a poro king chest, which unlocked with your bundle.  I don't believe it's currently possible to purchase or unlock a poro king chest individually.  Per the[ Snowdown Guide](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016), the only way would be to locate fragments and fuse them together.  I hope that helps clear things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=V2fh2vKp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-17T18:26:09.119+0000)
>
> I went to the store to check it out, and everything looks okay to me.  The icon that shows with the set is a Snowdown Bells icon and not a poro king chest, which unlocked with your bundle.  I don't believe it's currently possible to purchase or unlock a poro king chest individually.  Per the[ Snowdown Guide](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016), the only way would be to locate fragments and fuse them together.  I hope that helps clear things up!

I have a feeling this is because I'm using the legacy client, could you check the store in there as I clearly see as I described.

edit: here is a screenshot, I probably should have done this first:
http://imgur.com/a/fmtrF
In this specific screenshot, as Mysticman89 mentioned, the icon in this themed bundle is for a poro king chest _fragment_.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=V2fh2vKp,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-17T19:27:46.639+0000)
>
> In this specific screenshot, as Mysticman89 mentioned, the icon in this themed bundle is for a poro king chest _fragment_.

Woops, I was in a hurry and mistook the bundles being displayed on the front page of the store, here is a screenshot with the bundle I am confused about.

http://imgur.com/a/2cvR5
Oh, I see now where I was mistaken. "Set" means a set of chest + key and the icon I thought was a completed poro king chest was actually the jingle bell icon.
Looks like a poro king chest *fragment*, not a poro king chest to me (and that's also what the bundle seems to say). Do you know if you got a poro king chest fragment?

> [{quoted}](name=Mysticman89,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=V2fh2vKp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-17T18:56:59.934+0000)
>
> Looks like a poro king chest *fragment*, not a poro king chest to me (and that's also what the bundle seems to say). Do you know if you got a poro king chest fragment?

A set is not a fragment, but I don't believe I got a fragment either. The only fragments I have were from a star-themed chest bundle.
